mails.body: Welcome aboard! Your AOU account has been created. Please sign in to the portal to review your first-week schedule and complete your profile.

content.subject: Weekly Research Sync - Ocean Sensing Lab

mails.body: Reminder: Our Wednesday sync is at 10:00 in Lab B. Bring sensor deployment notes and calibration results.
IT will perform routine upgrades this Friday. VPN and Wi-Fi may briefly drop. No action needed.
Finance has approved PO #11872 for ROV tethers. Vendor: BlueLine Marine. Expected delivery: next Tuesday.
Attached is the agenda for Thursday's town hall. Submit questions via the Q&A form by 17:00 tomorrow.
Please complete the 15-minute security refresher by Friday. It covers phishing simulations and MFA best practices.
Admissions is seeking volunteers for Open Day. Two-hour shifts available. Reply if you can help.
A quick reminder to submit your timesheets by 12:00 today to avoid payroll delays.
R&D: send your abstracts and methodology sections by Monday for internal peer review.
Operations will issue updated access cards next week. Visit the Marina Gate office between 09:00-16:00.
Please review departmental spend and submit adjustments by end of week.
HR is hosting a stress-management session on campus next Wednesday. Limited seats, register via HR portal.
We've updated retention rules for research datasets. See the policy page and acknowledge receipt.
New advising appointments are available. Book via the Student Affairs portal.
IT will place two new MFDs on Level 2. Follow the driver install instructions in the portal.
A short safety drill will run tomorrow at 09:30 in the ROV bay. Please participate and follow coordinator instructions.
Remember to upload receipts within 10 days of travel. Finance can help with per-diem questions.
Operations updated the shuttle timetable. First trip now at 07:20. See intranet schedule.
Outreach kits are ready for pickup. Check your assigned schools and confirm logistics.
President's briefing is Monday 09:00 in Auditorium A. Coffee from 08:30.
Reminder: complete the compliance form using the intranet link.
Please review the attached document and confirm by EOD. Please acknowledge on the portal.
